header.title: Reservation Management
header.description: Simplify reservation management and boost your restaurant's clientele.

section1.title: How it Works
section1.description: To use our management system, simply contact us. We'll create your customized website with the reservation management system included. Start configuring your restaurants by adding opening hours, days of operation, and creating discount codes for specific days. It's easy and tailored to your needs.

section2.title: Benefits
section2.description: Managing your reservations has never been easier! With our management system, you can handle multiple restaurants, add unlimited discounts independently, and benefit from the traceability of bookings made on the website through the Meta pixel and Google Analytics tag.

benefit1.title: Total Control on Reservations
benefit1.subtitle: Maximum simplicity and efficiency
benefit1.description: With our restaurant reservation management system, you have complete control. Accept and decline reservations, customize your opening hours, and input your restaurant's closure days or hours. Easily and efficiently track reservations for each day.

benefit2.title: Multi-Restaurant Management
benefit2.subtitle: No limits and complete autonomy
benefit2.description: Manage multiple restaurants simultaneously and without restrictions. Easily add essential information such as the restaurant name and address, and decide when to publish them online.

benefit3.title: Attract customers with enticing discounts
benefit3.subtitle: Surprise your customers with enticing offers
benefit3.description: Unleash your creativity by creating customized offers and linking them to specific times and days of the week to maximize your customer flow.

benefit4.title: Optimize your investments
benefit4.subtitle: Monitor your results through the data tracked on the website.
benefit4.description: Installing Meta's Pixel and Google Analytics tag allows you to closely monitor visitor activity on your website. Improve online performance and reduce the costs of your advertising campaigns using tracking tags.

benefit5.title: Complete and Independent Website
benefit5.subtitle: No additional costs
benefit5.description: Bring your website to life without relying on third-party services. With the booking management system included in the price, you'll have a comprehensive, modern, and efficient website without additional costs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Fill out the form to initiate collaboration on your website, ask questions, or make requests. We're here to help you bring your vision to life.

work_hours.page_subtitle: Enter your restaurant's opening hours, during which customers can make reservations. You'll be able to block specific hours or days on other pages later.

discounts.discount_description: Add new discounts and drag them to the desired time.
discounts.discount_dropbox: Drag to apply the discount to all time slots on the chosen day

blocked_days.subtitle1: Customize the restaurant's weekly closing day. This option allows you to precisely set the day when the restaurant will be closed every week.
blocked_days.subtitle2: Click and drag to select closure days. Resize or delete closure blocks. Provide block titles so your customers know the reason for the closure.

blocked_times.subtitle1: Restrict reservations for specific time slots on the selected day, weekly.
blocked_times.subtitle2: Manage reservation restrictions for specific time slots on a particular date.
